destinations.name: Hawaii
destinations.short_desc: Hawaii offers stunning beaches, lush rainforests, and majestic volcanoes. Enjoy surfing, hiking, and rich culture while experiencing breathtaking sunsets and warm Aloha spirit.

destinations.name: Bora Bora
destinations.short_desc: Bora Bora’s turquoise waters, lush mountains, and iconic overwater bungalows create a dreamy escape. Snorkel with manta rays, explore coral gardens, and relax in paradise.

destinations.name: Fiji
destinations.short_desc: Fiji’s 333 islands feature white-sand beaches, coral reefs, and lush jungles. Dive with vibrant marine life, explore hidden caves, and enjoy friendly island hospitality.

destinations.name: Samoa
destinations.short_desc: Samoa offers pristine waterfalls, volcanic craters, and rich cultural heritage. Swim in natural pools, hike rainforest trails, and experience the warm Fa’a Samoa hospitality.

destinations.name: Tonga
destinations.short_desc: Tonga’s untouched beauty includes secluded beaches, limestone caves, and humpback whale encounters. Experience authentic culture, traditional feasts, and tranquil island serenity.

destinations.name: Tahiti
destinations.short_desc: Tahiti boasts crystal-clear lagoons, black sand beaches, and vibrant coral reefs. Enjoy luxury overwater bungalows, French-Polynesian cuisine, and mesmerizing traditional dance performances.
